it came down to the second Mark the

was the swing judge it was the Eastern

that's why before Salt Lake City as a

of the western block and I have rejected
that that that political aspect because
I wanted to be fair to the
schedule you have to make a choice and
you have 10 seconds to take your

because it was so close the rashan bear
has a new program with a creative

you don't judge only two seconds of the

it's an old program Love Story it's very
